recipe_metadata.title: Creative & Automation Services (Master Recipe)
recipe_metadata.description: This is a master recipe that orchestrates the deployment of optional creative and automation services. It is composed of multiple, modular sub-recipes, each handling a specific tool like Automatic1111, ComfyUI, n8n, and Penpot. Each sub-recipe is designed to be hardware-aware and support remote connections.

recipe_overview.description: Deploys an optional suite of creative and automation tools. Each service's deployment is conditional on user configuration and, where applicable, hardware profiling (e.g., for GPU-intensive tasks).

execution_plan: 1. Read the central configuration to determine which creative and automation services are enabled by the user.
2. For each enabled service, execute the corresponding sub-recipe.
3. Each sub-recipe will perform its own hardware compatibility check before proceeding with a local installation.
4. Refer to the `README.json` in the `06-creative-and-automation-services/` directory for details on each sub-recipe.
